summary.span: Represents a collection of objects.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當會開啟存放區中，結果由物件。When an store is opened, the result is represented by an object. 如果您熟悉的未受管理的密碼編譯 API 建構，您可以想像作為記憶體存放區的物件。If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an as a memory store of objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼中，開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區、 選取有效的憑證、 可讓使用者選取憑證，並再寫入至主控台的 憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, selects only valid certificates, allows the user to select a certificate, and then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 輸出取決於使用者選取的憑證。The output depends on the certificate the user selects. [!code-cpp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以搭配 PFX/PKCS12 二進位大型物件 (BLOB) 有密碼保護。This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password. 您可以建立 PFX/PKCS12 BLOB 中的憑證相關聯的金鑰容器和值可用來控制這個程序。Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the value can be used to control this process. 請注意，是否您未建立的金鑰容器，私密金鑰不會保存。Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted. 這個方法會將憑證的位元組陣列匯憑證的集合。This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates. 這個方法支援下列類型：This method supports the following types: - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以搭配 PFX/PKCS12 檔案或其他憑證檔案，需要密碼。This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password. 您可以建立 PFX/PKCS12 檔案中的憑證相關聯的金鑰容器和值可用來控制這個程序。Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and value can be used to control this process. 請注意，是否您未建立的金鑰容器，私密金鑰不會保存。Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted. 請注意 PFX/PKCS12 檔案可包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate. 這個方法會匯入私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果沒有私密金鑰找到，則第一個找到的憑證。This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found. 這個方法支援下列類型：This method supports the following types: - - - - - -
